net.powermatcher.core.bidcache

Class AggregatedBid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.api.data.Bid
      • net.powermatcher.api.data.ArrayBid
        • net.powermatcher.core.bidcache.AggregatedBid

  • public final class AggregatedBid
extends ArrayBid
    An AggregatedBid is the combination of several Bid of agents (as identified by their agentId's) that are aggregated into a single bid. This object is immutable and can only be created using the AggregatedBid.Builder.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AggregatedBid.Builder
      A Builder that makes it easier to create an AggregatedBid.
